1.title: Frontend Developer
1.descripcion:
Acerca del empleo
About Torc

Torc is a career-first platform that connects top tech talent with meaningful job opportunities. More than just job matching, Torc is a community — offering events, livestreams, and exclusive content to help professionals grow, learn, and stay connected. When you join Torc, you’re not just finding a job — you’re joining a network that supports your career development every step of the way.

To apply, make sure to complete your profile to be reviewed by our Matching Team. Take the assessment and if you’re the right fit, we’ll reach out to schedule a conversation.

About the Role

We are seeking a Front-End Developer to build intuitive, user-friendly, and scalable interfaces for modern web applications. You’ll collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and backend engineers to deliver seamless user experiences that align with business goals.
This role is perfect for someone who cares deeply about clean code, performance, and design systems, while staying up-to-date with the latest front-end frameworks and tools.
responsabilidades: Develop responsive and performant UIs using React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Collaborate with design teams to transform wireframes and prototypes into production-ready code.
Ensure consistency and scalability through design systems and reusable components.
Optimize front-end performance for speed, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility.
Integrate with backend APIs and services in collaboration with backend teams.
Write unit and integration tests to ensure stability and reliability.
Stay current with front-end trends and advocate for best practices.
requisitos: 3+ years of professional experience in front-end development.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3.
Hands-on experience with frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and modern state management (Redux, Vuex, NgRx).
Understanding of accessibility (WCAG) and responsive design principles.
Experience with Git and CI/CD workflows.
deseable: Knowledge of TypeScript and component libraries (Material UI, Bootstrap, Tailwind).
Experience with testing frameworks like Jest, Cypress, or Playwright.
Familiarity with GraphQL, WebSockets, or micro-frontend architecture.
Exposure to design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD).
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS Amplify, Firebase, or Azure).
1.direccion: Av. Amazonas y Naciones Unidas, Quito
